metadata.description: How much joy and excitement you bring to each other's lives

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Jupiter brings joy and adventure. Mars adds energy and initiative. Uranus brings spontaneity and surprise.

planet_meanings.Mars: energy, initiative, and drive to do things

very_low.label: Dry
very_low.guidance: Hanging out may feel flat; might not be your 'fun friend.'

low.label: Sporadic
low.guidance: Fun happens but not reliably; low-pressure plans.

mid.label: Chill
mid.guidance: Can have good time in the right mood.

high.label: Lively
high.guidance: Bring out each other's playfulness; good for regular hangouts.

very_high.label: Wild Card
very_high.guidance: Big adventure energy; shared stories, spontaneous plans.
